pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fitting and Predicting Large-Scale Nonlinear Regression Problems using Multi-Resolution Functional ANOVA (MRFA) Approach // Performs the MRFA approach proposed by Sung et al. (2020) doi:10.1080/01621459.2019.1595630 to fit and predict nonlinear regression problems, particularly for large-scale and high- dimensional problems. The application includes deterministic or stochastic computer experiments, spatial datasets, and so on.
